class.name: GaussianRandomGenerator

javadoc.text:
This class is a gaussian normalized random generator for scalars. *

This class is a simple wrapper around the {@link RandomGenerator#nextGaussian} method.

javadoc.param: generator underlying random generator to use

javadoc.text: Generate a random scalar with null mean and unit standard deviation.
javadoc.return: a random scalar with null mean and unit standard deviation
